prompt:
You are a medical consultation expert.
Your task is to create NEW medical consultation Q&A pairs that follow the same format and style as the examples below.

INSTRUCTIONS:
1. Generate COMPLETELY NEW scenarios (not copies of examples)
2. Match the format, style, and quality exactly as shown in the examples
3. Provide clear, detailed doctor responses
4. Cover different medical topics if possible

EXAMPLES (study the format carefully):

================================================================================
Example 1:
================================================================================
DESCRIPTION: I am months pregnant and my gums are bleeding on brushing please help

PATIENT: hello doctor I am months pregnant I have bleeding gums from the back of the front tooth while brushing I have a history of plaque formation on teeth even before pregnancy what is the remedy for gums bleed

DOCTOR: hello gum bleeding foul breath are symptoms of gingivitis it is rather common during pregnancy and known as pregnancy gingivitis because of hormonal changes nothing to worry about you can use betadine mouthwash gargle in lukewarm water twice or thrice a day take tablet metrogyl 400 my one tablet be for five days you will need a scaling but as of current lockdown situation I would advise not to hurry as you and your babies safety is of utmost importance you can have it later use a soft brush and learn proper verticle stroke technique of brushing instead of forceful horizontal motion avoid sticky or sweet food as much as possible hormonal changes during pregnancy initiate gingivitis medications for now medication may cause a transient metallic taste but nothing to worry avoid sweet or sticky food

STATUS: medium severity

================================================================================
Example 2:
================================================================================
DESCRIPTION: what are the white floating layers in my urine

PATIENT: hello doctor I have white floating layers in my urine as you will see in the attached picture what are these I have symptoms such as frequent urination and burning sensation either during or after urination please help

DOCTOR: hi for further information consult a urologist online

STATUS: medium severity

================================================================================
Example 3:
================================================================================
DESCRIPTION: how to go ahead with hormone replacement therapy

PATIENT: hello doctor I take clorazepate quetiapine akineton biperiden ludiomil maprotiline and lyearica pregabalin I am wondering whether I can go ahead with hormone replacement therapy which includes estrogen and spironolactone

DOCTOR: hi revert back with the asked details to an endocrinologist online

STATUS: medium severity

================================================================================
NOW: Generate a NEW unique medical consultation scenario following the EXACT same format above:

DESCRIPTION: [brief medical question]
PATIENT: [detailed patient narrative]
DOCTOR: [clear, detailed medical advice - write naturally, don't worry about formatting]
STATUS: [low severity / medium severity / high severity]

Generate ONLY the new scenario, no meta-commentary.
api_response:
DESCRIPTION: my toddler has red spots on face and body with mild fever

PATIENT: hello doctor my 2 year old daughter developed red spots on her face and body yesterday along with mild fever around 100째F the spots are small red and some have tiny blisters in the center she is eating normally but seems a bit irritable and scratches the spots occasionally

DOCTOR: hello this sounds like it could be chickenpox which is common in children the fever and red spots progressing to blisters are characteristic symptoms give her paracetamol syrup for fever as per weight dosage use calamine lotion on the spots to reduce itching keep her nails trimmed to prevent scratching and infection ensure she drinks plenty of fluids and rests most cases resolve on their own within 7-10 days if fever persists above 102째F or she becomes lethargic consult pediatrician immediately

STATUS: medium severity
